metadata.name: NFTNYC2023 Friends
metadata.description:
Hi, I'm Arya and I'm an 8-year-old NFT creator and artist. 

With this highly-detailed, high-resolution 1/1 art piece, I wanted to leave a mark on my NFT journey to celebrate being one of the official #NFTNYC2023 Artists.

This piece was all digitally hand-drawn from my imagination and illustrated on a single layer. I also inserted a few of my previous character designs into it. 

Together, they celebrate the beauty of creating art, the friendship among artists & NFT community

The artwork has a resolution of 3000 x 2400 pixels and is 300 DPI.
